FuncDef: This command monitors arbiter statistics in an egress port queue group.
CLIs: port <port-id> egress <network> queue-group <queue-group-name> instance <instance-id> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] [ arbiter [ root | <name> ] ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies statistics are for an egress network queue group.
Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
When the absolute keyword is specified, the raw statistics are displayed, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
When the rate keyword is specified, the rate-per-second for each statistic is displayed.

Specify the name of the policer control policy arbiter. Values-An existing arbiter-name in the form of a string up to 32 characters, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
